attributes.title: worst app ever😾😾
attributes.review: when I downloaded the app it made my phone veryyy glitchy. It made my phone completely stop working. After that it killed my DOG😿😿😾 his last words were black lives matter😢😔😔

attributes.title: Horrible !
attributes.review: this app made my phone crash, as soon as I opened it. Once i found out how to get the virus out of my phone i had a humongous bill to pay. Dont get this app , absolutely horrible.

attributes.title: Hack
attributes.review: This app was terrible it shut down on me and locked my phone and I couldn’t open my phone for a whole week and then when I went to the store they told me it was the app,

attributes.title: The Best App
attributes.review: Literally the best app out there, our president for another 4 years!!!🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: BLM ACAB✨😝
attributes.review: ummm this app is terrible. it made my phone glitch and i kept seeing some orange racist sexist homophobic xenophobic pig pop up on my screen when i opened the app. i honestly don’t recommend this app to anyone, i mean unless ur racist sexist homophobic xenophobic and sexist....but if u r then um get help. 😘💕💕💕

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: What a terrible app. It’s insane that we let people actually look at this stuff. It made  my phone glitch like crazy and when I used it my phone turned orange just like our president. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: as a woman nearing her 70s, i found this app to be VERY difficult to use!!! i’m not an expert on technology and i had no clue how to use this app! my grandson said he thinks it put a VIRUS on my phone, but he can’t be sure. VERY CONFUSING and a WASTE OF STORAGE. i will NOT be downloading again.

attributes.title: Total Garbage.
attributes.review: The I my thing this app did was waste a lot of my phone storage for nothing. It’s useless and it has a lot of bugs that are never fixed. Not to mention the unnecessary propaganda. 🙄

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: not only when i opened this app it started playing a pitchy banjo version of hips don’t lie but then proceeded to give my phone 39 viruses! it also took ages to load and is very glitch. 10/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Don't get it
attributes.review: This app is the worst made me move houses because our racist president wanted to build a wall between my country and made my entire family cry , because this app made flies get in and it's cause he's a cow
